property.name: text
property.value: This model calculates the antenna gain based on the SenderLocation and ReceiverLocation and modifies the Properties accordingly. Author: Yang Zhao

property.name: text
property.value: This model is similar to the phasedArray model, but uses IterateOverArray actor to generate sensors and steerings. Author: Rachel Zhou
